alert.note: Alert for Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 11:27AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL AFFECT NORTHAMPTON COUNTY... At 1127 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Grand View, or 10 miles southwest of Cape Charles, moving east at 35 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with this storm. This storm will be near... Cape Charles around 1145 AM EDT. Cheriton and Bay View around 1150 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Capeville, Birdsnest, Kiptopeke State Park, Eastville, Machipongo, Simpkins, Townsend, Oyster, Kiptopeke and Cheapside. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm, and may cause localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
